reviewText: Great musician and great music if like this type

I bought Insomnia Unauthorized & Kid Rock The Complete Story they were the same DVD but wasn't happy with that!!!  I really didn't care for the first one Kid Rock wasn't in it at all!  I don't recommend it!!!!

This video is a total ripoff. It is unauthorized by Kid Rock and contains no video footage of Kid at all, only interviews by some of his childhood friends and the like. Not nearly as well done as a typical Biography piece.

On the plus side it does include a lot of faintly suggestive footage of some strippers doing "sexy" moves but not showing anything at all, but even some pretty girls are not enough to save this atrocity.

Don't waste your money or time with this video...horrible, boring and pointless. If you're a guy and enjoy watching chicks who can't dance, then yes, it's worth the price.  But other than that, the video is such poor quality and the people being interviewed are unbelievably boring.  There is no actual footage of Kid Rock.  Plain and simple, it's a total rip off!

the thing about kid rock is his music and performances the  only thing worth a star is the cover.it is full of stranage  people from his past school experiences  talking. waste waste of time  and i love kid rock....no wonder it is unauthorized.
